description: Writing Studio emphasizes process and practice as students reflect on their emerging identities as
thinkers, readers, and writers. The course is ideal for students seeking ongoing support in their
personal and academic transition to the rigor of college-level academics by providing guidance in
areas such as course attendance and engagement, completion of assignments, and reading, writing,
and speaking development.  Offered annually in the fall and spring semester. Prerequisite: writing
placement or permission of the instructor.
